name: Cats have more than 9 rewinds
description:
Earth is in danger, and you have to save the planet!

Problem is: you have 5 minutes.

Keyboard controls:

Arrow keys to move, Z to jump, Space to enter rewind mode, Up arrow to interact with objects, X and C to activate items 2 and 4.

While in rewind mode you can move the marker with arrow keys and Space to confirm.

Controllers are also supported.

For those who get lost:

While rewinding everything is reset back to the way it was, this includes the upgrades themselves, but excludes the keycards and blueprints (since they are in the character's brain).

To get the upgrades interact with the replicator after collecting the item's blueprint.

Submitted to Brackeys Jam 2020.2 with the theme: rewind.

This is a sequel to two other games: Catkind's Great Discovery and How to read piano sheet music but they are not required to play in order to understand the story.
